10 Look-Fors: Integrated Observation

3 look-fors

Evidence-based look-fors aligned to multiple frameworks

Look-For #1RequiredratingWeight: 10

The learning target is clearly communicated and relevant to students.

Look for visible learning targets and student understanding

#learning-targets#clarity
Framework Alignments:
5 Daily Assessment PracticesCRP (Curriculum Relevance)Tripod: Clarify
Look-For #2RequiredratingWeight: 10

Teacher fosters an inclusive environment where all students feel belonging.

Observe inclusive language and cultural affirmation

#belonging#inclusive
Framework Alignments:
CRP (General)CASEL (Social Awareness)Panorama (Student Experience)Tripod: Care
Look-For #3RequiredratingWeight: 10

Teacher checks for understanding and adjusts instruction.

Look for checks for understanding and instructional adjustments

#formative-assessment#responsive-teaching
